mapper.select: SELECT i.item_name, i.item_detail, i.item_price, i.item_amount, c.cart_id, c.member_id, c.item_id, SUM(c.cart_amount) cart_amount, (m.img_url || m.img_name) item_img FROM cart c inner join item i on c.item_id = i.item_id inner join item_img m on i.item_id = m.item_id WHERE c.member_id = #{value} GROUP BY i.item_name, i.item_detail, i.item_price, i.item_amount, c.cart_id, c.member_id, c.item_id, (m.img_url || m.img_name) order by item_id desc
